attributes.action: Advise Her Majesty to withdraw Bob Geldof's knighthood.
attributes.additional_details: During the recent EU Referendum Sir Bob Geldof conducted himself in an appalling manner. He has brought his honour into disrepute and should be stripped of the same.
attributes.background: Sir Bob Geldof has acted in such a manner as to bring the honour he holds into disrepute

rejection.details:
We can't accept petitions asking for people's honours to be taken away. You can find out more about how honours are taken away here:

https://www.gov.uk/honours
